scripts.pack:chrome: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm mkdir && bestzip build/chrome-$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.zip dist/*
scripts.pack:firefox: pnpm clean && BROWSER=firefox vite build && pnpm mkdir && bestzip build/firefox-$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.zip dist/*
scripts.pack:brave: pnpm clean && BROWSER=brave vite build && pnpm mkdir && bestzip build/brave-$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.zip dist/*
scripts.pack:all: rm -rf build && pnpm pack:chrome && pnpm pack:firefox && pnpm pack:brave
